channel.title: Logging Into My Source Help
channel.description:
Hey all!
I'm in the process of making my own source. But I need to log in to take some pictures and get some information on some things to change around. But I can't log in! I have done all there is to do with making a server thing. But when I click on runserver it say's it's currently online! But then I go to try to log in, and it just keeps saying, "Error Connecting To Server"! I have tried typing in my IP but it still don't work. I have No-IP running and the server IP checked but it still don't work. I have tried logging in with the server spot blank, still didn't work. I have tried logging in with 0.0.0.0, still didn't work. I have tried logging in with 127.0.0.0, still didn't work. Does anyone have the answer to this? Any help will be GREAT!
Thank you in advance. -1 Pk3r 1

item.title: Logging Into My Source Help
item.dc:creator: @1_Pk3r_1 1 Pk3r 1
item.description:
@1_Pk3r_1 wrote:

Hey all!

I’m in the process of making my own source. But I need to log in to take some pictures and get some information on some
things to change around. But I can’t log in! I have done all there is to do with making a server thing. But when I click on
runserver it say’s it’s currently online! But then I go to try to log in, and it just keeps saying, “Error Connecting To Server”!
I have tried typing in my IP but it still don’t work. I have No-IP running and the server IP checked but it still don’t work. I have
tried logging in with the server spot blank, still didn’t work. I have tried logging in with 0.0.0.0, still didn’t work. I have tried
logging in with 127.0.0.0, still didn’t work. Does anyone have the answer to this? Any help will be GREAT!

Thank you in advance.
-1 Pk3r 1
